name: Leap Point
description:
Ludwig Jam submission

Theme: Foddian (Anger - Inducing)

Leap Point is a simple 3D rage game with the objective of getting to the goal. The movement system is unique, being able to only move with your jumps, as well as double jumping.

Made By: Phamility

Music - A NIGHT ALONE - TrackTribe

Notes:

  • The game was made in 12 hours.
  • Disregarding the infamous "CUBETHON", Leap Point is my first attempt at a 3D game, and serves as a test.
  • Honestly, I could've added moving platforms, rotating platforms,  particles, and a bunch of more stuff, but I was too lazy .-.
